definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[וְשָׁרִים כְּחׂלֲלִים]] Ps 87:7 as well the singers as the pipe-players, cf. AV; < RV Pe De Che Bae al.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. [[וְהָעָם מְחַלְּלִים בַּחֲלִלִים]] 1Ki 1:40 and the people piped with pipes (cf. As. ḫâlalu, acc. to Dl in Zim:BP 117).
